about_the_game:
Hours After Midnight is a game where you take control of one of the heroes who swore their revenge on Rettam'diov - the Consumer of Worlds for their fallen homelands. Survive everything your enemy throws at you in this roguelike survival adventure! Collect gold, find new allies, craft and upgrade your powers, and destroy all the evil that haunts your new home!




Don’t like to play alone? One of our key features is the possibility to play in multiplayer mode! Gather your friends and complete your missions together without worrying… about different platforms, because we’ve got your back with cross-platform support!


The demo version of the game currently implements:
  • Online Co-Op component.
  • Time Trial Gamemode: Our primary game mode in which players need to survive 20 minutes.
  • Deity System: The demo version implements 10 Deities to choose from.
  • Elemental Damage: All features of our elemental system are there.
  • Items, Abilities and Hero:
    Two Heroes, Cynthia And Victor,
    16 Non-class Abilities,
    28 Items,
    7 Unique Enemies all with 4 stages of difficulty (Normal, Veteran, Elite, and Champion), depending on how far you’ve survived.
  • Mini-boss at the end of the Demo level: Unlike basic enemies, it features a more complex sequenced set of abilities.
  • Dynamic Events: A Storm and Blood Moon event that triggers every few minutes or every few levels gained.
  • Buffs/Debuffs: 14 status effects, including 2 positive buffs that can sometimes spawn on the map and one provided by Victor’s ability.
  • Full Controller Support.
